'''Tuaha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. She can be found standing by the stairs outside [The Kraken's Eye](/theKrakensEye/) in Port Maje.

## Background

{{Description|An aumaua clutches the hilt of a long sabre sheathed at her belt, her attention moving among the passers-by without ever settling anywhere for long. She stands as motionless and watchful as an owl.}}
Tuaha is another of [Maia Rua](/maiaRua/)'s old associates. The two go way back and have been pulling each other out of various scraps for years, though the relationship started with Tuaha being Maia's CO, though when their ship was assigned to the RDC, they wound up on more even terms, learning from each other. Now, Tuaha is on assignment to Port Maje to engineer an assassination for Grand Secretary Atsura - and picked up a tail.
